entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers over western sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
